# FileSystemSource

| Characteristic | Value  |
| -------------- | ------ |
| Type           | `enum` |

## Variants

### New

Create a new file system.

| Characteristic | Value    |
| -------------- | -------- |
| Type           | `string` |
| Value          | `new`    |

### Adopted

Use an existing file system from an adopted partition.

| Characteristic | Value     |
| -------------- | --------- |
| Type           | `string`  |
| Value          | `adopted` |

### OS Image

Use an existing file system from an OS image.

| Characteristic | Value      |
| -------------- | ---------- |
| Type           | `string`   |
| Value          | `os-image` |
